title: NL Search Engine: dynamic query builder for Research Desk (Film Room)
description: Build intelligent NL search engine for Research Desk (Film Room). Replace 11-pattern regex matcher with 5-stage dynamic query pipeline: entity extraction, intent classification, table selection/join planning, SQL generation, validation/fallback. Supports win/loss context, composite multi-filter queries, comparison queries, and arbitrary dimension stacking. Phase 1: entity extraction + intent classifier + view coverage matrix. Phase 2: QueryBuilder with composable filters. Phase 3: comparisons + disambiguation. Phase 4: query explanation panel + history.
founderReviewNote: Founder approved NL Search Strategy plan 2026-02-11. Directed: assign to Jose Mourinho, use TKT-181, link strategy plan. Implementation to begin Phase 1 immediately.

florentino_gate.reason: Directly improves paid artifact - Film Room is core analytical feature
